mapper.insert: insert into qna_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer) values( seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer} )
mapper.update: update qna_reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(rno) from qna_reply where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update qna_board set replyCnt = (select count(reply) from qna_reply where bno = #{bno}) where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno from qna_reply where rno = #{rno}
